com.asm.language

Interface Language

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLanguage, LoadedLanguage

    public interface Language
    general interface for apply in CodeEdit. You can make language easier to extends BaseLanguage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence text, int start, int before, int count)
      Edit event that called after text changed.
      void beforeTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence text, int start, int count, int after)
      Edit event that called before text changed.
      <T> T getData(java.lang.String name, T defaultValue)
      Return the some parameters and arguments.
      LanguageInfo getInfo()
      Return the language info.
      CodeSuggest getSuggest()
      Return the CodeSuggest object.
      void highlight(int start, int end)
      Highlight the words from start to end.
      void initLanguage(HighlightArgs edit)
      Called when language initialize.
      CodeAnalysis newAnalysis()
      Return the new CodeAnalysis object.

    • Method Detail

      • initLanguage

        void initLanguage(HighlightArgs edit)
        Called when language initialize. Might called several times, when CodeEdit.setLanguage() several called.

      • beforeTextChanged

        void beforeTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                       int start,
                       int count,
                       int after)
        Edit event that called before text changed.

      • afterTextChanged

        void afterTextChanged(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                      int start,
                      int before,
                      int count)
        Edit event that called after text changed.

      • highlight

        void highlight(int start,
               int end)
        Highlight the words from start to end. The call priority is beforeTextChanged -> afterTextChanged -> highlight. (when text changed) text changed event is run on UI thread, but highlight might be called

      • getInfo

        LanguageInfo getInfo()
        Return the language info.

      • newAnalysis

        @Nullable
CodeAnalysis newAnalysis()
        Return the new CodeAnalysis object. Can be null.

      • getSuggest

        @Nullable
CodeSuggest getSuggest()
        Return the CodeSuggest object. Can be null.

      • getData

        <T> T getData(java.lang.String name,
              T defaultValue)
        Return the some parameters and arguments. May be many values, like keywords
